short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that replaces the new tab page with animated waves and gradient backgrounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the new tab page with a new one that has waves scrolling across the screen along with search and customizable colors.
